integration_patterns: Data integration with Snowflake for analytics
API-based integration for electronic health records (EHRs)

evidence.claim: Bitscopic utilizes AWS infrastructure for their services and application hosting.
The company implements FHIR standards for data interchange in health information management.
Bitscopic employs Kafka for real-time data streaming and integration solutions.
The use of HL7 standards is evident in their EHR integration capabilities.

icp.icp_reason: Bitscopic utilizes X12 formats for healthcare integrations, fitting API-first model.
